Default Modules¶

Any or all of these may be used to compose a custom server via: fws_server -f

class filtered_websocket.filters.broadcast_messages.BroadcastMessagesFilter[source]¶

Broadcasts messages to all connected clients.

class filtered_websocket.filters.broadcast_messages_by_token.TokenMessageFilter[source]¶

Allows clients to register a token group by prefixing an id with “token:” Once registered all messages sent by the client will only be received by other clients registered under the same key.

class filtered_websocket.filters.broadcast_messages_by_token.TokenDisconnectFilter[source]¶

Remove ids of clients no longer connected.

class filtered_websocket.filters.broadcast_pubsub.BroadcastPubSubFilter[source]¶

Will broadcast all consumed events to connected websocket clients.

class filtered_websocket.filters.stdout_rawdata.StdoutRawDataFilter[source]¶

Print any client data received to the server console’s stdout.

class filtered_websocket.filters.stdout_messages.StdoutMessageFilter[source]¶

Print any client messages received to the server console’s stdout.

class filtered_websocket.filters.stdout_pubsub.StdoutPubSubFilter[source]¶

Print any consumed queue data to the server console’s stdout.
